summary: Killer sharks invade the waters off the Florida coast as co-eds celebrate spring break.
cast: Shannon Lucio|Riley Smith|Justin Baldoni|Bianca Lishansky|Genevieve Howard|Warren McAslan|Kathy Baker|Bryan Brown|Wayne Thornley|Wayne Harrison|Miguel Borges|Sindi Harrison|Mehboob Bawa|Claire Watling|Shirley Kirchmann|Marisa Sarfatti|Nicole Sherwin|Jessica Knight|Lisa-Marie Schneider|Garth Breytenbach|Peter Oh|Nicole Mandy|Sabine Palfi|Nikki Nelson|Danielle Judovits
title: El ataque de los tiburones
